::Wolveritron::

    He heard the message on his comm and he wondered why a=
nyone would want to wait to fight. But he did.

::Bobertron/Pantron::

    =
They sat around formulating a plan against the Predacons. The plan was very=
 simple, sneak up and directly attack the Pred base. But they didn't know w=
here the base was. They also wanted to find CyberShark to help them attack.=

    "To the computer room!" Bobertron said. They went into the room and wa=
lked up to a computer console. "Where is CyberShark"
    "Unit CyberShark i=
s located in vector 2189."
    It showed a location and Pantron hailed Cybe=
rShark.
    "Yo, Cyber, why you just sitting there? We want you to help us =
attack the Pred base." Pantron said over his comm.
    "Sorry, I can't let =
you do that, I am in peace negoations with the Predacons, it would look bad=
 if I attacked them." He replied.
    Bobertron and Pantron looked at each =
other and smiled. They left the base and headed towards the Predbase.
